circumstances: The crew was engaged in a test flight. During the take off roll, the aircraft deviated to the left. The pilot tried to counteract but aircraft left runway to the left, crossed the tarmac and collided with two parked aircraft. A huge explosion occurred and all three aircraft were destroyed by fire. All three crew members were seriously injured.
probable_cause: According to the RAF, a leading edge slat broke on left wing during the take off roll,  affecting control capability of the aircraft that veered off runway.
